title: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park: Donate
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Donate            Donate       Thank you for your interest in supporting Kennesaw Mou ntain National Battlefield Park. Philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference and we welcome and are grateful for your support. Please mail donations to: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park 900 Kennesaw Mountain Dr. NW Kennesaw, GA 30152 Attn: donations We thank you and appreciate your support for our National Treasures.
